resources.string: Are you sure \nyou want to change it?
It is very important to use Superconn with quick starter. Otherwise, you always have to turn on and off your data connection.
Your internet connection will be closed down\nand notifications updated every 150 second.
Your internet connection will be closed down\nand notifications updated every 5 minute.
Your internet connection will be closed down\nand notifications updated every 10 minute.
Your internet connection will be closed down\nand notifications updated every 15 minute.
Your internet connection will be closed down\nand notifications updated every 30 minute.
When you need internet connection, touch\n Superconn icon which is always at the top of the screen.
If you have a problem with getting notification,\nopen rH2 time.

Sorry,
only available for
Android 4.1(Jelly Bean) and below
according to Android Permission Rules
